name: Téry Hut Trail
description: A scenic mountain trail leading to Téry Hut with stunning alpine views.

name: Lake Bled Viewpoint
description: Short, rewarding hike to a panoramic viewpoint over Lake Bled.

name: Dobogókő Circuit
description: Forest trail with lookout points and rock formations near Dobogókő.

name: Grossglockner Trail
description: Challenging alpine route around Austria’s highest peak.

name: Csóványos Summit
description: Beautiful forest hike to one of Hungary’s highest summits.

name: Lomnicky Peak Trail
description: Demanding trail to one of the most famous peaks of the Tatras.

name: Rila Lakes Circuit
description: Loop trail visiting the iconic Seven Rila Lakes.

name: Plitvice Waterfalls Trail
description: A scenic path through the famous turquoise lakes and waterfalls.

name: Kékes Summit
description: Popular hike to the highest point in Hungary with a lookout tower.

name: Albanian Alps Traverse
description: Challenging mountain path connecting Theth and Valbona valleys.
